TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Threading.Tasks.Task<string> TokenProvider.AuthenticationCallback(string audience, string authority, object state);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed TokenProvider/AuthenticationCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function TokenProvider.AuthenticationCallback(audience As String, authority As String, state As Object) As Task(Of String)
type TokenProvider.AuthenticationCallback = delegate of string * string * obj -> Task<string>

Docs.param: The AAD resource URI which the access token is authorized. For example: https://relay.azure.net/
Address of the authority to issue the AAD token.
State to be delivered to the callback.
Docs.summary: A user supplied handler that would be invoked to obtain the AAD access token string.
